about_the_game:
Meteoric VR is a low poly first-person space shooter where your mission is to protect the planet from incoming meteors. One hit is enough to lose it all. Our signature feature is a unique movement that you have to make with your hands to achieve successful shooting.

Features:
- 180 degrees gameplay
- Zero motion sickness
- Easy to play
- Aim assist
- Multiple power ups
- Fitness element
- Adaptive music
- LIV and MRC support
- Scoring system

We created Discord as the main platform to interact with the community and beta testers. We share sneak peeks, hottest news, behind the scenes content, and answer questions on a daily basis. If you are interested in the game or want to help us out by giving constructive feedback, please feel free to join the server.

JOIN US → https://discord.gg/VjgDjR5rkD
